column1: # Comments: Residential & commercial floorspace assumptions consistent with AEO. Data Details: MOST RECENT UPDATE YEAR = AEO 2022. Residential floorspace is calculated
column3: by multiplying total # of houses by avg sq ft per house then converting to billion meters^2 (flsp not directly provided & provided data is in sq ft). Residential floorspace calculation is split into 3 distict parts: historical data
column5: and extrapolated data.  Historical data is calculated from the most recent AEO possible. AEO's typically go back 3 years
column8: etc. In the event that an AEO only goes back one or two years
column11: etc.) most recent historical data is still used. AEO projected data is pulled directly from the MOST RECENT UPDATE YEAR. Extrapolated data takes the growth rate provided in the MOST RECENT UPDATE YEAR
column12: applies it to the farthest possble future year

column1: # Source: EIA Annual Energy Outlook (AEO) (Each AEO from 1996-MOST RECENT UPDATE YEAR) - https://www.eia.gov/outlooks/aeo/
